Home Libraries People FAQ More
http::parser::chunked

(Inherited from http::basic_parser)

Returns true if the last value for Transfer-Encoding is "chunked".

Synopsis 
bool
chunked() const;
Description
Remarks

The return value is undefined unless http::basic_parser::is_header_done would return true.
